welcome_message_body: Welcome to Marikina City, where the charm of its shoe industry and the beauty of its riverbanks await you. We invite you to explore and enjoy our vibrant and welcoming city.

restaurants.name: Gino's Brick Oven Pizza
restaurants.description: Gino's Brick Oven Pizza is a pizzeria located in Quezon City.
restaurants.address: 319 Katipunan Ave, 1108 Quezon City, Quezon City

restaurants.name: S&R New York Style Pizza
restaurants.description: S&R New York Style Pizza is a pizzeria located in Quezon City.
restaurants.address: U.P. Town Center, Katipunan Ave, Diliman, 1101 Quezon City, Quezon City

restaurants.name: The Chocolate Kiss Café
restaurants.description: The Chocolate Kiss Café is a café located in Quezon City.
restaurants.address: Magsaysay Ave, University of the Philippines, Diliman (at Balagtas St), 1101 Quezon City, Quezon City

restaurants.description: Crepeman Café is a café located in Quezon City.

restaurants.name: One Fifty Food Place

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at the airport, serving both domestic and international flights for multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it primarily serves domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport, serving domestic flights to and from Manila.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
